Registration Open for Autodesk University 2013

Registration is now open for Autodesk University 2013.

It is easier this year, because you use your Autodesk account (Autodesk ID). If you donâ€™t have one, you can easily create it during registration.

The AU website has been updated to help you find all of the preconference events scheduled for Monday, the classes and hands-on labs that might interest you, and other activities taking place during the conference.

All industry specific activities and class highlights are listed on focused pages for

  • Product design & manufacturing,
  • AEC, infrastructure, and oil & gas,
  • Media & entertainment, and
  • Education.

You can save up to $500 by signing up before October 20.

I mentioned my three classes when pointing out the class catalog preview.

I am looking forward to seeing you there.
